title: 2H-SnS2 assembled with petaloid 1T@2H-MoS2 nanosheet heterostructures for room temperature NO2 gas sensing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24130-24140
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03194F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shraddha Hambir, Shashikant Shinde, H. M. Pathan, Som Datta Kaushik, Chandra Sekhar Rout, Shweta Jagtap
In this study, we explored the gas-sensing capabilities of MoS2 petaloid nanosheets in the metallic 1T phase with the commonly investigated semiconducting 2H phase.
